Package Project

Class Menu

java.lang.Object
Project.Menu
public class Menu extends Object
Represents a list of record of the menu items. Menu items classified in to Main Dish, Beverages, Desserts, Promotion Sets.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Menu()
    Creates an empty list of Main Dish, Beverages, Desserts, Promotion Sets.

  • Method Summary

    • displayMenu

      Display the whole menu. Including (Main Dish, Beverages, Desserts, Promotion Sets).

    • addMenuItem

      public void addMenuItem()
      Ask for menu item require information (Name, Description, Price) Check for information validity before adding to the record.

    • updateMenuItem

      public void updateMenuItem()
      Update menu item information. Ask for ID of menu item to be updated. Check for information validity before changing the record.

    • deleteMenuItem

      public void deleteMenuItem()
      Delete menu item from menu. Ask for ID of menu item to be deleted. Check for information validity before deleting the record.

    • addPromoItem

      public void addPromoItem()
      Ask for Combination of (Main Dish, Desserts, Beverages). Check for information validity before adding to the record.

    • updatePromoItem

      public void updatePromoItem()
      Update promotion set information. Ask for ID of promotion set to be updated. Check for information validity before changing the record.

    • deletePromoItem

      public void deletePromoItem()
      Delete promotion item from menu. Ask for ID of promotion item to be deleted. Check for information validity before deleting the record.
